questList.questDescription: The Shadows of Despair have plagued the Shadowed Depths, spreading fear and darkness. Your quest is to vanquish the Wraith Whisperer, the mighty Stalker Ghost that commands these shadows.
Ethereal Phantoms haunt the depths with their spectral presence. Seek out and eliminate the Illusionist Mischief, the weak Boggart Trickster that misleads travelers with illusions.
The Twilight Terrors lurk in the shadows, waiting to strike. Your task is to defeat the Dusk Revenant, the mighty Shadow Wraith that spreads terror in the darkness.
The Glacial Horde freezes all in their path with icy malice. Your mission is to take down the Stonecrusher, the strong Rock Troll that leads this chilling horde.
The Frozen Legion marches across the Frostbite Plateau with undead determination. Defeat the Blizzard Drake, the strong Frost Wyvern that commands this frozen army.
The Icebound Phantoms haunt the icy wastelands with their chilling presence. Your goal is to eliminate the Frostfall Archmage, the formidable Ancient Lich that weaves icy spells.
The Infernal Legion engulfs the Rusty Chain Stronghold in flames. Take on the Crimson Enforcer, the formidable Red Devil that orchestrates fiery chaos.
The Molten Horde surges through the stronghold with scorching intensity. Defeat the Inferno Colossus, the mighty Fire Giant that leads this molten force.
The Rusthorde corrodes all it touches with its tainted presence. Your task is to bring down the Necroforge Magus, the formidable Summoner Lich that commands this rusted army.
